categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kurse was a male Pureblood Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. At some point he became part of the Order of Revan and defected the Empire, joining with the Revanite forces on Yavin 4. Kurse and his fellow Revanites tried to stop a strike team from reaching Revan and the temple of Sacrifice artifact, but were defeated and killed.
Lord Kurse appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
